Included with a Western Digital hard disk or storage product}} | |} {{Reflist|2|group="Notes"|refs=TestDisk runs on Microsoft Windows, Linux, Mac OS, DOS, FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD and Sun SolarisThis program does not run in the context of the [[operating system]] and maintains a pre-boot execution environment of its own.Partition Wizard Home Edition and Partition Wizard Business Edition run on Microsoft [[Windows 2000]], [[Windows XP]], [[Windows Vista]] and [[Windows 7]]. Partition Wizard Server Edition and Partition Wizard Enterprise Edition also run on Microsoft [[Windows Server 2003]] and Microsoft [[Windows Server 2008]]. Partition Wizard Bootable CD runs outside the context of the operating system and maintains its own pre-boot execution environment.Partition Wizard Home Edition, Business Edition and Bootable CD are available [[freeware|free of charge]]. Partition Wizard Server Edition or Enterprise Edition are available as [[Commercial software|commercial products]].Partition Master Home Edition is available for 32-bit versions of Microsoft Windows 2000, Windows XP and Windows Vista. Partition Master Professional Edition is also available for 64-bit versions of Microsoft Windows XP and Windows Vista. Partition Master Server Edition and Unlimited Edition are also available for Microsoft Windows Server 2003 and Windows Server 2008.Partition Master Home Edition is available free of charge. Partition Master Professional Edition, Server Edition and Unlimited Edition are commercial products. }} == References == {{Reflist}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Disk Partitioning Software}} [[Category:Disk partitioning software|*]] [[Category:Lists of software]] [[fr:Gestionnaire de partitions]] [[vi:Danh sÃ¡ch cÃ¡c pháº§n má»m phÃ¢n vÃ¹ng ÄÄ©a]]
